title: Seduced
description: Can love really conquer all?   Swearing. Sexual Content. Mature topics. Cliffhanger. Part Two of Four. Serial Romance. For 18+ Readers.  For Charity McAdams the glitz and glamour of Hollywood are not as tempting finally being with Brandon. But Brandon's career is on the fast track and Charity can't resist the pull Brandon has on her. Leaving her small-town life won't come easily for her, but saying goodbye to Brandon a second time will be even harder.  Although it’s early on in their reunion, Brandon needs Charity to make a life-altering decision. Can she pick up and leave all she’s ever known to be by Brandon's side in Hollywood?  You will love this contemporary new adult and college romance women's fiction story if you enjoy: - Women's fiction - Action and Adventure Romance Fiction - Celebrity Romance - Contemporary Romance - Billionaire Romance - New Adult and College Romance - Steamy Romance  Note. Swearing and sexual content. Cliffhanger. Serial romance Part 2 of 4
author: Audra Cole
